97.heading: Gonzalez, Speedy.
97.title: "Especially When That Gato is Wearing the Hat!"
97.author: [No author]
notes: Summary: Speedy enjoys the Mexican hat dance; Sylvester is overwhelmed.

98.heading: González, Ungenio.
98.title: "Cruce"
98.author: [No author]
98.series: Condorito) p. 23 in Condorito Gigante, no. 550
notes: Ungenio paints the lines for a pedestrian crosswalk, then stands on the corner waiting for it to dry before he can cross and go on with his work.

99.heading: González, Ungenio.
99.title: "Cuerdas"
99.author: [No author]
99.series: Condorito) p. 5 in Condorito de Oro, no. 75
notes: Condorito is hanging over the edge of a cliff, and Ungenio tries to rescue him by throwing a rope over. No "plop!" ending.

100.heading: González, Ungenio.
100.title: "Deducción"
100.author: [No author]
100.series: Coné) p. 47 in Condorito Gigante, no. 550
notes: Genito talks to the mailman about a letter for his Aunt Rosa. A sign on the house identifies it as that of Ungenio González.

101.heading: González, Ungenio.
101.title: "Derechos"
101.author: [No author]
101.series: Condorito) p. 21 in Condorito de Oro, no. 75
notes: 2 tiers. Condorito explains about pedestrians having the right of way, and Ungenio jumps out of the car to exercise his rights.

102.heading: González, Ungenio.
102.title: "Empaque"
102.author: [No author]
102.series: Condorito) p. 35 in Condorito de Oro, no. 75
notes: Ungenio González gets a job wrapping packages, and wraps his own hands into his first package.

103.heading: González, Ungenio.
103.title: "Estación"
103.author: [No author]
103.series: Condorito) p. 33 in Condorito de Oro, no. 75
notes: 3 tiers. Condorito sends Ungenio to the station to see when the train leaves, and Ungenio doesn't come back until the train is gone.

104.heading: González, Ungenio.
104.title: "Gemelo"
104.author: [No author]
104.series: Condorito) p. 79 in Condorito de Oro, no. 75
notes: Ungenio has a new girlfriend, who is one of a pair of twins.

105.heading: González, Ungenio.
105.title: "Inversión"
105.author: [No author]
105.series: Condorito) p. 22 in Condorito Gigante, no. 550
notes: 1 vertical tier. Condorito, Huevoduro and Ungenio rob a bank. Ungenio doesn't feel safe carrying all that money around, so he goes to the front of the bank to wait for them to open so he can deposit it.

106.heading: González, Ungenio.
106.title: "Llamada"
106.author: [No author]
106.series: Condorito) p. 12 in Condorito Gigante, no. 550
notes: 2 tiers. Doctor Ungenio gets a desperate phone call from a man saying, "I can't live without you," and starts grabbing his medical equipment, but his wife says don't bother, the call was for her.

107.heading: González, Ungenio.
107.title: "Mafia"
107.author: [No author]
107.series: Condorito) p. 15 in Condorito Gigante, no. 550
notes: Ungenio tried to join the mafia, but was kicked out when they sent him out for coke and he came back with Pepsi.

108.heading: González, Ungenio.
108.title: "Obediencia"
108.author: [No author]
108.series: Condorito) p. 82 in Condorito de Oro, no. 75
notes: Soldier Ungenio impresses the sergeant with his lack of military skills.

109.heading: González, Ungenio.
109.title: "Pajar"
109.author: [No author]
109.series: Condorito) p. 5 in Condorito Gigante, no. 550
notes: Ungenio pays a visit to Condorito in the country, and feels sorry for the cows because their hay is upstairs in a loft, and it must be difficult for them to climb up there.

110.heading: González, Ungenio.
110.title: "Papel"
110.author: [No author]
110.series: Condorito) p. 8 in Condorito Gigante, no. 550
notes: 2 tiers. Condorito buys wrapping paper from Ungenio, who asks if he wants it giftwrapped.

111.heading: González, Ungenio.
111.title: "Teléfono"
111.author: [No author]
111.series: Condorito) p. 10 in Condorito de Oro, no. 75
notes: Condorito and Ungenio have been stranded on a deserted island for two years, and Condorito makes a telephone for amusement.
